## Installation

```bash
pip install git+https://github.com/SamEdwardes/connectapi-python.git
```

## Usage

```{python}
from connectapi import Client, Content

client = Client()
content = Content.get_one(client, content_guid="241fe2cd-6eba-4a79-9aa3-6e6fe28c5714")
print(content)
```
